pages.text: $(li)The Speaker Block can send messages in chat or to the narrator to near players when it receives a redstone signal.$(br)$(li)You can right click a Speaker Block to open the configuration GUI.
$(li)In this GUI you can configure the message to show, the mode and the radius in which the players will receive this message.
$(li)You can change the Speaker Name, changing the name of the block in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).
$(li)Finally, when the Speaker Block receives a redstone signal, it will show the message in chat or in narrator mode.
